name: Zan Wang
content: TJU SAIL Zan Wang(王赞) College of Intelligence and Computing, Tianjin University, YaGuan Road, Tianjin, China wangzan@tju.edu.cn Profile I am currently a professor in the school of College of Intelligence and Computing of Tianjin University. I have obtained my Ph.D. degree in 2009 from Tianjin University. My research interests mainly focus on concurrent program analysis, Deep neural network testing, Self-driving autonomous vehicles' testing, and natural language processing. Working Experience Tianjin University 2010 - 2015 Assistant Professor Tianjin University 2015 - 2021 Associate Professor Tianjin University 2021 - Now Professor Education Tianjin University 2004 - 2009 Ph.D., Information System and Information Management Tianjin Unviersity 2002 - 2004 Master,Computer Science Tianjin Unviersity 1996 - 2000 Bachelor,Applied Mathematics Projects Research on detecting, localizing concurrency bugs quickly and generating high quality patches automatically 2019 - 2022 National Natural Science Foudation of China Research on the data management system for simulation testing of autonomous driving vehicle 2019 - 2020 Intelligent manufacturing special fund of Tianjin Conference MLIRSmith: Random Program Generation for Fuzzing MLIR Compiler Infrastructure Haoyu Wang, Junjie Chen*, Chuyue Xie, Shuang Liu, Zan Wang, Qingchao Shen, Yingquan Zhao In: The 38th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software Engineering, September 11-15, 2023, pages to appear, Luxembourg [pdf] Testing the Compiler for a New-Born Programming Language: An Industrial Case Study (Experience Paper) Yingquan Zhao, Junjie Chen, Ruifeng Fu, Haojie Ye, Zan Wang In: Proceedings of the 32nd ACM SIGSOFT International Symposium on Software Testing and Analysis. 2023: 551-563.
